intro: Chase down the suspect behind a serial killing!
description:
A whole series of crimes happens right before your eyes: a murder in an alley, abductions in broad daylight, not to mention your boss being shot… Are you a seasoned enough detective to  deal with it all?

Step into your first case, in which a man was murdered with a blooming red hyacinth left on his body – the sign of a notorious serial killer from many years ago. But this particular killer has been dormant for a long time… is it a copycat? Or has the killer come back from beyond?

The story only gets more complicated… and more personal. With the involvement of your psychologist, Mark Coleman, and the killing of your boss, you have no choice but to get the culprit behind bars as soon as possible. 

But there is another urgent matter: people are disappearing from their cars. Then, the journalist Noah Hall, famous for covering the Red Hyacinth’s serial killings, is murdered as well. How is it all connected?

Can you stop this wave of crime? Are you ready to apply your brilliant detective mind to do that? 

The Collector’s Edition game includes:
• Excellent graphics and voice overs
• 7 crime-filled chapters
• 8th Collector’s Edition bonus chapter
• 18 hidden object puzzle scenes and 22 mini-games
• Customizable difficulty levels
• Behind-the-scenes collection of beautiful concept art
